mapper.select: SELECTE lecture_no, teacher_name, lecture_name, lecture_startdate, lecture_enddate, lecture_total FROM lecture ORDER BY lecture_no DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lecture( account_id, subject_no, teacher_name, lecture_name, textbook_isbn, lecture_startdate, lecture_enddate, lecture_total, classroom_no, lecture_createdate, lecture_updatedate ) VALUES ( #{accountId}, #{subjectNo}, #{teacherName}, #{lectureName}, #{textbookIsbn}, #{lectureStartdate}, #{lectureEnddate}, #{lectureTotal}, #{classroomNo}, NOW(), NOW() )
